description: Makoto is a boy who makes his first appearance when he and http://anidb.net/ch21554 [Shuuichi] are in sixth grade, though they are in different classes. Known as Mako for short, though mostly only to Shuuichi, he too wishes to be a girl and shares Shuuichi`s interest in cross-dressing; it is this that spurs Makoto to become Shuichi`s only close male friend.
name: Ariga Makoto
